form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
center, centers, centering, centered
.

sense.def:
The centre of something
je sredina nečesa.

seg.quote: He moved the table over to the centre of the room.
...a black wig with a centre parting.
The centre section was coloured pink.

sense.def:
A centre
je kraj, kjer se ljudje sestajajo, dobivajo pomoč ali sodelujejo pri neki dejavnosti.

Če je neko območje ali mesto
a centre for an industry or activity
, je neka industrija ali dejavnost tam zelo pomembna.

seg.quote: The region began as a centre for sheep-farming.

sense.def:
The centre of a situation
je najpomembnejša stvar v določenem položaju.

seg.quote: Smith was right in the centre of the action.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
the centre of attention or interest
, ljudje tistemu posvečajo veliko pozornosti ali se za tisto zanimajo.

seg.quote: She was the centre of public admiration.

sense.def:
V politiki se
the centre
nanaša na politične skupine in prepričanja, ki niso niti levičarska niti desničarska.

seg.quote: ...a relatively small centre party called the Free Democrats.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
centred in a particular place
, ima v tistem kraju svojo osrednjo enoto.

seg.quote: They were now centred in the new Royal Observatory at Greenwich.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
centres around/on a person or thing
, je tista oseba ali stvar poglavitna téma ali središče pozornosti.

cit.quote: vrteti se okoli koga ali česa

seg.quote: The workers' demands centred around pay and conditions.
Attention was for the moment centred on Michael Simpson.
